Room.Name: Lady Drianna's Private Chambers
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Lady Drianna's personal and private chambers in the Towers.
Room.LongDescription: Lady Drianna is the stunningly beautiful elven wife of Lord Aaileman. This is the chamber where she goes when she's not accompanying him on his various duties. She also uses this chamber for meeting with important individuals from the city. Drianna is typically more understanding of the city's people and their problems.
